frame.name: Fields
frame.definition:
<def-root>An individual or group (<fen>Practitioner</fen>) or a part of their work life (<fen>Work</fen>) is defined professionally by the <fen>Activity</fen> that they typically engage in. Alternatively, the <fen>Activity</fen> may be indicated by a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> conventionally associated with it.
<ex> <fex name="pra">Chris</fex> was <m>in</m> the <fex name="act">construction</fex> <t>industry</t> for 20 years before coming to GSCM.</ex>
<ex><fex name="wor">My career</fex> <m>was</m> <t>in</t> <fex name="sal">oil and gas</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition:
<def-root>An activity that defines a group of people in their professional capacity.
<ex>One of the companies we are presently invested in is Boral, which is in the <fex name="act">building</fex> <t>sector</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Practitioner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual, group, or organization that engages in the <fen>Activity</fen> as part of their profession.
<ex><fex name="pra">I</fex> <m>am</m> <t>in</t> biology (molecular immunology).</ex>
<ex>The manufacturing <fex name="pra"><t>sector</t></fex> has complained to the State Bank of Pakistan (SBP) about the country's private commercial banks.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Salient_entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>A physical or abstract entity that is characteristically associated with the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>These companies who have their roots in either the 19th or early 20th century have been <t>in</t> <fex name="sal">oil</fex> all their existence.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Work
FE.definition:
<def-root>A phase of a <fen>Practitioner</fen>'s career that is spent engaged in an <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="wor">My most recent job</fex> was in the construction <t>industry</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition: <def-root>The subfield of the <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Practitioner</fen> is engaged in. </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Practitioner</fen> engages in the <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: industry.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a particular branch of economic or commercial activity

lexUnit.name: sector.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a distinct part of an economy, society, or sphere of activity

lexUnit.name: in.prep
lexUnit.definition: COD: indicating someone's occupation or profession.

lexUnit.name: field.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a particular branch of study or sphere of activity.

lexUnit.name: area.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a subject or range of activity.

lexUnit.name: artistic.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having a talent for creating art.

lexUnit.name: art.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the expression or application of creative skill and imagination, especially through a visual medium such as painting or sculpture.

lexUnit.name: literary.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: concerning the writing, study, or content of literature, especially of the kind valued for quality of form.

lexUnit.name: literature.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the study of written works, especially those regarded as having artistic merit.

lexUnit.name: theater.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a play or other activity considered in terms of its dramatic quality.

lexUnit.name: industrial.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: of or from a particular branch of economic sector

lexUnit.name: history.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the academic study concerned with understanding the events of the past

lexUnit.name: mathematics.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the branch of science concerned with number, quantity, and space, either as abstract concepts (pure mathematics) or as applied to physics, engineering, and other subjects (applied mathematics)

lexUnit.name: finance.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the management of money, especially with respect to governments and large companies.

lexUnit.name: technical.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: connected with machinery, engineering or applied sciences
